meanings.definition: The state or quality of being like a beggar.
meanings.sent1: Her beggarliness was evident in her tattered clothes and empty pockets.
meanings.sent2: The beggarliness of the man on the street touched the hearts of passersby.
meanings.sent3: Despite his friend's teasing, his beggarliness at the party was endearing.
meanings.sent4: The beggarliness of the abandoned house made it seem haunted and forlorn.
meanings.sent5: The beggarliness of the stray cat made it hard to resist taking it home.

meanings.definition: The behavior or attitude of a beggar.
meanings.sent1: His beggarliness was evident in his constant requests for spare change.
meanings.sent2: The beggarliness of the child at the market was met with sympathy by the vendors.
meanings.sent3: Despite his tough appearance, his beggarliness shone through when he asked for help.
meanings.sent4: The beggarliness of the street performer added to the authenticity of his act.
meanings.sent5: The beggarliness of the old man was a stark reminder of the hardships of life on the streets.
